name: @cspell/dict-en-gb-mit
description: British English dictionary for cspell with MIT License.

scripts.compile: cat source-files.txt | xargs cspell-tools-cli compile --trie3 -x compound --merge en_GB -o . --no-compress && yarn run gen-checksum
scripts.conditional-build: yarn run --silent checksum || yarn run build
scripts.gen-checksum: cat source-files.txt source-dependencies.txt | sort -u | xargs shasum > checksum.txt
scripts.test: yarn run test-dict && yarn run test-text

author: Jason Dent
